Notes:
Yogurt, any kind
Fruit
Bar
etc...
Needs to eat most of it

Potty first
Usual just shirt and underwear
Towel in door - closed as much as possible
She will try to stall, say you'll do whatever it is after a good nap
Don't go back in, tell her to get some rest and wait for purple

Needs to eat most of it
NO pedialite
Can have dessert if she eats good

Brush hair before
Glow sticks are ok
She might want to wash her own face

Water bottle is OK
Saying goodnight to dogs is OK
Potty
3 books, she reads one
Sometimes gets chapstick from drawer
She may try to stall, tell her to get good rest and go to sleep
Door closed with towel as closed as possible
Once she's sleeping close the door all the way
Keep and eye out on the monitor for when she is fully asleep. The door can gently be closed after that (turn the handle while closing so it doesnt click)
